ygData.msgSnippet: The Predacons get to the brig and places him in a staius hold. When the Predacons leave Lobstruck looks at the others.  Lock the door and make two keys, one

   The Predacons get to the brig and places him in a staius hold.  
When the Predacons leave Lobstruck looks at the others.  "Lock the 
door and make two keys, one for me and one for UltraByte, then leave 
the autoguns on for any movement."

  With this said Lobstruck left the room.  Lepord goes locks the door 
and makes the two keys while Lady Right turns on the auto guns.

Computer:  30 seconds until autoguns are turned online.

  "Come on Void lets get out of here."  Lepord says as the two 
predacons wait for Void to make an exit.

OOC:  No you don't, unless you make one of your intruders thing 
again.

you'll
